},[]);const toggleMenu=()=>{setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen);};const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem("token");setIsLoggedIn(false);navigate("/");};const handleScroll=id=>{const section=document.getElementById(id);if(section){section.scrollIntoView({behavior:"smooth"});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:IMG,alt:"Logo",onClick:()=>handleScroll("home")})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hamburger",onClick:toggleMenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bar"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`nav-links ${isMenuOpen?"active":""}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",onClick:()=>handleScroll("home"),children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>handleScroll("about"),className:"text-blue-500",children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>handleScroll("services"),className:"text-blue-500",children:"Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/bloglist",children:"Blogs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>handleScroll("contact"),className:"text-blue-500",children:"Contact"}),isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/blogform",children:"Add Blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"bg-red-500 px-4 py-2 rounded text-white",children:"Logout"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:" text-white",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",className:" text-white",children:"Register"})]})]})]});};export default Navbar;
